faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Quick answers about English to Persian translation

item-1.question: Is this English to Persian translator completely free?
item-1.answer: Yes, our English to Persian translator is completely free to use with no hidden charges, registration requirements, or usage limits.

item-2.question: How accurate is the English to Persian translation?
item-2.answer: Our translator uses advanced AI technology to provide highly accurate translations that capture the meaning, tone, and cultural context of the original text.

item-3.question: Can I translate documents from English to Persian?
item-3.answer: Yes! You can upload .txt and .docx files for direct translation from English to Persian, making it easy to translate longer texts and documents.

item-4.question: What Persian dialect does this translator use?
item-4.answer: Our translator primarily uses standard Iranian Persian (Farsi), which is widely understood across Persian-speaking regions including Iran, Afghanistan, and Tajikistan.

item-5.question: Is my data secure when using this translator?
item-5.answer: Absolutely. We use secure encryption for all translations and don't store your text on our servers. Your privacy and data security are our top priorities.
